name: Elenial Attack
description:
Elenial is a game where you must create your own unique team with Elenials! Play strategically with money, parcels and many other different possibilities!

Recommended age: 12+

Minimum System requirements

OS: Windows 7

RAM: 132 MB

CPU: 32 bits

Resolution: 800x600

Sound card: DirectX 8

DirectX download: http://www.microsoft.com/windows/directx
